Changelog
=========

.. include:: includes/all.rst

**debops-contrib.foodsoft**

This project adheres to `Semantic Versioning <http://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html>`__
and `human-readable changelog <http://keepachangelog.com/en/0.3.0/>`__.

The current role maintainer_ is ypid_.

`debops-contrib.foodsoft master`_ - unreleased
----------------------------------------------

.. _debops-contrib.foodsoft master: https://github.com/debops-contrib/ansible-foodsoft/compare/v0.1.0...master

Changed
~~~~~~~

- Full role rewrite. All inventory variables have been renamed.
  When updating, handle it like a different role and refer to the
  documentation. [ypid_]


ypid.foodsoft v0.1.0 - 2015-11-01
---------------------------------

Added
~~~~~

- Initial coding and design. [ypid_]
